name: Dino Munchies
description:
Welcome to Dino Munchies

This game was started and completed as a solo project for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3. Thanks for checking it out!

You're a hungry Dino that lurks in an alley behind a popular restaurant. The customers of this establishment are known for throwing their food out the window... lucky you!

Your goal is to eat as much as you can - and get as many points as possible - while trying to balance the healthy "scraps" with the junk food - too much junk food and your tummy might just explode.

It's an all you can eat buffet!

All art, code, sound and music done by myself during the jam.

In-game Font used created by Smile Studio: https://www.dafont.com/smile-studio.d309
